result.eng: This is the person to whom the money was given.
result.ga: Seo an duine ar tugadh an t-airgead dó
result.orig: Seo an duine ar tugadh an t-airgead dó
result.html: Seo an duine ar tugadh an t-airgead dóThis is the person to whom the money was given.
result.ponchtml: Seo an duine ar tugaḋ an t-airgead dóThis is the person to whom the money was given.

result.eng: They put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.
result.ga: Chuir siad a gcomhairlí i dteannta a chéile agus dúirt siad gurbh fhearr an duais a thabhairt dó
result.orig: Chuir siad a gcomhairlí i dteannta a chéile agus dúirt siad gurbh fhearr an duais a thabhairt dó
result.html: Chuir siad a gcomhairlí i dteannta a chéile agus dúirt siad gurbh fhearr an duais a thabhairt dóThey put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir siad a gcoṁairlí i dteannta a ċéile agus dúirt siad gurḃ ḟearr an duais a ṫaḃairt dóThey put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.

result.eng: I was given a fine on the spot.
result.ga: Gearradh fíneáil orm ar an láthair
result.orig: Gearradh fíneáil orm ar an láthair
result.html: Gearradh fíneáil orm ar an láthairI was given a fine on the spot.
result.ponchtml: Gearraḋ fíneáil orm ar an láṫairI was given a fine on the spot.

result.eng: She has given us very reasonable advice.
result.html: Thug sí comhairle an-chiallmhar dúinnShe has given us very reasonable advice.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug sí coṁairle an-ċiallṁar dúinnShe has given us very reasonable advice.

result.html: Tugadh pardún dóibhThey were given a pardon.
result.ponchtml: Tugaḋ pardún dóiḃThey were given a pardon.

result.eng: I am much indebted to you for the support you've given me.
result.ga: Tá mé go mór faoi chomaoin agat as an tacaíocht a thug tú dom
result.orig: Tá mé go mór faoi chomaoin agat as an tacaíocht a thug tú dom
result.html: Tá mé go mór faoi chomaoin agat as an tacaíocht a thug tú domI am much indebted to you for the support you've given me.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé go mór faoi ċomaoin agat as an tacaíoċt a ṫug tú domI am much indebted to you for the support you've given me.
